Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/85th
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 87th, Burley, 83rd and South Shore : due to, street blockage near Commercial/85th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 87th, Burley, 83rd, South Shore and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Commercial/85th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Pulaski and 59th: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Kilbourn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Pulaski, 59th and into Midway, due to street blockage near 63rd/Kilbourn.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Racine
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
